name: Utherworld V1
description:
This is a game that I've been working on for about 2 months now. This is simply a learning experience and I gave myself until Halloween to see what I could put out. 

There's no saving, but the game is very short, if you're dedicated the game can't take more than 20 minutes to complete. 

Helpful hints, open and close your equip menu with the q button, 

if a menu seems stuck... try pressing the mouse button a few times...

It's very possible that loading your list of magic spells during combat can be CPU intensive.
